name: LOGRO_5_POWERUPS
description: Collect 5 powerups.

description: Collect 10 powerups.

description: Collect 3 secondary weapons.

name: LOGRO_CENTRO_FINISHED
description: Complete the center zone.

name: LOGRO_KONI_HAIL
description: Hail 25 service robots in a single game.

name: LOGRO_KONI_TELEPORTED
description: Be carried within a box by a service robot.

name: LOGRO_KONI_SUICIDE_ROBOT
description: A service robot is killed for not being polite.

name: LOGRO_BOOGER_200_KILLS
description: Defeat 200 punks.

name: LOGRO_BOOGER_15_KILLS_PUNCH
description: Defeat 15 or more punks with a single Megapunch.

name: LOGRO_PLANTS_EXPLORED
description: Explore the whole greenhouse.

name: LOGRO_PLANTS_DEVICE_FOUND
description: Find a hidden strange device.

name: LOGRO_PLANTS_SETAS_FOUND
description: Find the hidden broken robot.

name: LOGRO_BIPED_DESTROYED
description: Destroy the big biped.

name: LOGRO_BIPED_DESTROYED_10S
description: Destroy the big biped in 10 or less seconds.

name: LOGRO_GEEK_FOUND
description: Find one geek item.

name: LOGRO_GEEK_ALL_FOUND
description: Find all geek items.

name: LOGRO_LEVEL_5
description: Obtain the complete Green Card

name: LOGRO_LEVEL_10
description: Obtain the complete Purple Card

name: LOGRO_LEVEL_15
description: Obtain the complete Red Card

name: LOGRO_LEVEL_20
description: Obtain the complete Golden Card

name: LOGRO_KILL_BOXES_WITH_JUMP_WAVE
description: Destroy 8 boxes with one jump wave.

name: LOGRO_CUT_MOB_DIALOG
description: Cut a conversation between two droids by posessing one of them.

name: LOGRO_SOULS
description: Collect all souls in a room.

name: LOGRO_SOULS_CENTER
description: Collect all souls in the Center Zone.

name: LOGRO_SOULS_GREENHOUSE
description: Collect all souls in the Greenhouse.

name: LOGRO_SOULS_LABS
description: Collect all souls in the Labs.

name: LOGRO_SOULS_CHUNKER
description: Collect all souls in the Chunker.

name: LOGRO_CUBES_1
description: Accumulate 5,000 energy cubes.

name: LOGRO_CUBES_2
description: Accumulate 10,000 energy cubes.

name: LOGRO_CUBES_3
description: Accumulate 15,000 energy cubes.

name: LOGRO_CUBES_4
description: Accumulate 20,000 energy cubes.

name: LOGRO_CONTROLLED_KILLS
description: Kill 100 enemies in a single game using controlled robots.

name: LOGRO_RECYCLE
description: Kill a robot throwing it into the Chunker's crushers.

name: LOGRO_PENITENT
description: Stay 30 seconds crouched during an alarm phase.

name: LOGRO_GANAR
description: Finish the game.

name: LOGRO_PERDER
description: Finish the game with an unhappy ending.

name: LOGRO_ALARM_CENTER
description: Survive all alarms in the center zone in Survival mode.

name: LOGRO_ALARM_PLANTS
description: Survive all alarms in the greenhouse in Survival mode.

name: LOGRO_ALARM_LABS
description: Survive all alarms in the laboratories in Survival mode.

name: LOGRO_ALARM_ALL
description: Survive all alarms in the whole Nakamura space station.

name: LOGRO_LABS_EXPLORED
description: Complete the labs zone.

name: LOGRO_CHUNKER_EXPLORED
description: Explore the whole chunker.

name: LOGRO_ENTER_NAME_1
description: Took the naming directions too literally.

name: LOGRO_ENTER_NAME_2
description: REALLY took the naming directions too literally.

name: LOGRO_END_GAME_MEDIUM
description: Finish the game in Medium or Hard difficulty.

name: LOGRO_END_GAME_HARD
description: Finish the game in Hard difficulty.

name: LOGRO_END_GAME_CLASSIC
description: Finish the game in Classic mode.

name: LOGRO_END_GAME_SURVIVAL
description: Finish the game in Survival mode.

name: LOGRO_MASOKA
description: Finish the game having selected the last skill of all Nakamura's row as soon as they were available.

name: LOGRO_NO_SKILLS
description: Finish the game without selecting any skill in the Skill Tree.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_1
description: Complete the mission 'The Drone Collector'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_1B
description: Complete the mission 'The Drone Collector' without harming any android or enemy with your pistol.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_1C
description: Complete the mission 'The Drone Collector' destroying a maximum of 20 boxes.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_2
description: Complete the mission 'the Ropes'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_2B
description: Destroy 100 enemies in the mission 'the Ropes'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_2C
description: Complete the mission 'the Ropes' without touching the ground for more than 10 seconds.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_3
description: Complete the mission 'Aikido'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_3B
description: Destroy 3 turrets in less than 1 second in the 'Aikido' mission.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_3C
description: Complete the mission 'Aikido' without crouching down.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_4
description: Complete the mission 'Radiation'

name: LOGRO_MISSION_4B
description: Find all secrets in the mission 'Radiation'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_4C
description: Complete the mission 'Radiation' without using any item (left column in your inventory).

name: LOGRO_MISSION_5
description: Complete the mission 'Leap gun'

name: LOGRO_MISSION_5B
description: Destroy 8 androids in less than 2 seconds in the 'Leap gun' mission.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_5C
description: Complete the mission 'Leap gun' having always 15 or more bullets.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_6
description: Complete the mission 'Spread it'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_6B
description: Find the 'Seeking gun' in the mission 'Spread it'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_6C
description: Gather 3000 or more cubes in the mission 'Spread it'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_7
description: Complete the mission 'Basket'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_7B
description: Complete the mission 'Basket' having magnetized all your grenades to something. Only 10 misses are allowed.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_7C
description: Complete the mission 'Basket' with a maximum of 15 seconds elapsed between each kill.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_8
description: Complete the mission 'Boom Boom Boom!'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_8B
description: Complete the mission 'Boom Boom Boom!' without using any shield.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_8C
description: Complete the mission 'Boom Boom Boom!' with your HP never running lower than 50%.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_9
description: Complete the mission 'Debug Squad'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_9B
description: Do not get hurt until you kill 1000 bugs in the 'Debug Squad' mission.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_9C
description: Do not let any energy capsule dropped by bugs be uncollected for more than 20 seconds in the 'Debug Squad' mission.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_10
description: Complete the mission 'Robot Factory'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_10B
description: Complete the mission 'Robot Factory' without using more than 15 drones.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_10C
description: Complete the mission 'Robot Factory' without letting a single robot escape.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_11
description: Complete the mission 'The Swapper'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_11B
description: Destroy 32 enemies in the mission 'The Swapper'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_11C
description: Complete the mission 'The Swapper' without jumping.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_12
description: Complete the mission 'Drop Box'.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_12B
displayName: Cut no holes in my box
description: Complete the mission 'Drop Box' without letting any box be destroyed by a laser.

name: LOGRO_MISSION_12C
description: Be in the air for 8 seconds in the mission 'Drop Box'.
